entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
